bioAsHtml: Web developper, craftsman, architect for almost 20 years I've discovered and used quite a lot of web technologies and development practices. I've learned to love some, to hate others, to keep some, to forget most... Today I'm seeking for better code, more enjoyable to write, more evident to read, less cumbersome to maintain.

acceptedTalks.title: ...but why are we then still writing JavaScript? / ...mais alors pourquoi encore coder en JavaScript ?

bio:
Web developper, craftsman, architect for almost 20 years I've discovered and used quite a lot of web technologies and development practices. I've learned to love some, to hate others, to keep some, to forget most...
Today I'm seeking for better code, more enjoyable to write, more evident to read, less cumbersome to maintain.
